sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState} from 'react'; import "./PostRecipe.css" function PostRecipe() { const [recipeName, setRecipeName] = useState() const [image, setImage] = useState() const [ingredients, setIngredients] = useState() const [procedure, setProcedure] = useState() return (
Recipe Name { setRecipeName(e.target.value) }} required="required" />
Upload Image { setImage(e.target.value) }} />
Ingredients { setIngredients(e.target.value) }} />
Procedure { setProcedure(e.target.value) }} />
) } export default PostRecipe
